label: 摩訶般若波羅蜜多経
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 52nd  . Nara National Museum . 2000
見出し読み: まかはんにゃはらみたきょう
説明文: Also called Daihannyaharamitakyō. Skt. Mahaprajnaparamita-sutra. A monumental scripture in six-hundred fascicles on the essential Buddhist doctrine of emptiness (kū; Skt. Sunyata) . [大般若波羅蜜多経、空]
